body.name: Nutrichef Double Basket Air Fryer 8.8 QT | Family Size Oil Free Airfryer with Transparent Window | 9-1 Preset Cooking Options | 360° Hot Air Circulation Technology | 4.4 QTs per Basket | Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: CUTTING-EDGE COOKING CONVENIENCE: Experience effortless cooking with the innovative 360° hot air circulation technology of the air fryer. Prepare your meals quickly and uniformly, achieving that delightful crispy texture with minimal to no oil.

MASTERFUL COOKING PRECISION: Harness the power of 9 preset programs and customizable time/temperature settings with the instant air fryer to achieve culinary perfection every time. Watch over your cooking progress through the transparent window.

EFFORTLESS CLEANUP SOLUTION: Our air fryer features non-stick components, a detachable basket, and a dishwasher-safe tray, simplifying the cleaning process. Spend more time savoring your culinary creations and less time on maintenance.

SAFETY & ENDURANCE ASSURED: Prioritize safety with automatic shut-off, overheat protection, and light indicator features in the air fryer mini. 304 stainless steel heating elements & heat-resistant materials ensure durability and performance.

SLEEK MODERN DESIGN: Elevate your kitchen with the contemporary black air fry finish. Its display not only adds a touch of modern elegance but also seamlessly integrates into your kitchen setup, boasting dimensions of 16.53" x 15.74" x 12.79".
body.description: Introducing the 4.4QT Dual Basket Air Fryer in sleek Black, a revolutionary addition to modern kitchens. This innovative appliance redefines healthy cooking by harnessing the power of 360° Hot Air Circulation Technology to deliver crispy, flavorful results with little to no oil. Its dual basket design, boasting a combined capacity of 4.4QT+4.4QT, allows you to prepare substantial meals quickly and efficiently. The customizable cooking experience is at your fingertips with the multi-function touch control panel and the specialized digital display, offering precise temperature adjustments up to 400°F and time settings up to 60 minutes. The inclusion of nine preset programs takes the guesswork out of cooking various dishes. Safety remains paramount with features like the automatic shut-off function, overheat protection, and light indicators. The transparent viewing window lets you monitor your culinary creations without interrupting the cooking process. Cleaning is a breeze thanks to the non-stick surfaces, removable basket, detachable oil tank, and dishwasher-safe tray. Crafted with heat-resistant materials, including a 304 stainless steel heating element, this air fryer ensures durability. Elevate your cooking with the 4.4QT Dual Basket Air Fryer, where health, taste, and convenience converge.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us NutriChef was created on the principle that healthy home cooking should be attainable to all, regardless of skill level and economic status. Starting in 2014, we noticed the disconnect in our lives and in the lives of those around us. We were so busy, always rushing forward, and our health and personal lives suffered. We needed to find some way to slow down and put our health first, all without sacrificing convenience or taste. Could we somehow create healthier versions of our favorite foods, easily in our own kitchens? The answer was a resounding yes, and NutriChef was born.

Our brand was created out of a desire to provide an alternative to fast food convenience and reintroduce people to home cooking. A healthy home-cooked meal is what brings families and friends together. We believe strongly in the value of simple pleasures. An evening spent cooking and sharing a meal of wholesome, nourishing foods is a memory in the making. Today, we have built upon our original mission and now in addition offer products that make the art of entertaining a simpler one. Entertaining and hosting family and friends are one of the great joys of life. Why waste a moment stuck in the kitchen? We offer products that free you up to socialize, while never sacrificing quality or taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm totally loving this dual basket air fryer!! I especially love the fact that it allows me to cook different items at the same time! The digital display is user friendly and see through window allows you to cook and see how done your food is without having to open the door. It also has 9 presets so you could pretty much just select whatever food you want to cook with a push of a button! This air fryer circulates heat evenly so your food comes out perfectly done each time. I also love that your cooking without any oil so imagine how many calories and fat your saving. This air fryer looks very modern and sleek too which matches my decor perfectly. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This thing STINKS
reviews.reviewText: It looks good, great price but when I went to use it there’s a horrible plastic burning smell coming from it. I thought maybe I missed a piece of plastic but I inspected it and no nothing melted and from what I can tell the smell is coming from the top burner. I gave it a second try and my whole house stinks like chemicals. I’m chucking this thing right in the garbage I’m not even wasting my time jumping thru Amazon’s hoops of trying to stuff this thing back into a box that they deem appropriate. In fact I’m dropping this to a 1 star for being a complete waste of money and a literal headache!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Double your yum
reviews.reviewText: I have always wanted a double oven but I will settle for a double air fryer. This is almost as good in my opinion since I use an air fryer so much, pretty much daily. The double baskets allow me to prepare everything that I want at once, whether warming pizza and garlic bread, fries and chicken tenders, etc. It’s really fast and efficient at cooking and requires no preheating. This is a convenient option when I want to cook something quick, especially when I don’t want to warm up the house with the oven when it’s hot. I like how I can time things individually if one thing will take more time. It’s just a great design. They thought of everything with this air fryer, from the height that allows it to fit under my top cabinets on my counter to the front facing controls so I don’t have to slide it out to use. It’s a really thoughtful and user friendly design. I like the crisper trays in the baskets that do double duty of letting air circulate better around food and also making it easier to clean. Overall I find cleanup easy since everything has a non-stick coating. The baskets are nicely sized for my needs and a good compromise on cooking space and overall footprint of the air fryer. I don’t think it takes up too much space on my counter but if you have the cupboard space and want it put away, it will fit on a standard cupboard shelf. Overall, a nice air fryer and superior design for me compared to the large, single basket ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only complaint I have is how to make the racks stay put! I have seen alot of complaints about this. But this is my first air fryer, game changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this fryer. The temp gets really hot. It seems to cook faster than other fryers. The dual drawers are everything! No more waiting to cook other items. Both sides are going at once. The panel is user friendly. I think it's a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken up on arrival
reviews.reviewText: If I could leave no stars I would. It arrived broken. I can't even open the 2nd basket. Had to go out and spend unnecessary money to eat out because I couldn't cook what I had planned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes cooking dinner easy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This family-size, oil-free airfryer has really upped my game in the kitchen. Love, love loving the transparent window, it adds a touch of style to any countertop.What sets this air fryer apart is its impressive 9-1 preset cooking options. From fries to chicken wings, you can easily prepare a wide variety of dishes with just a click of a button. And thanks to its 360° hot air circulation technology, your meals come out perfectly crispy and evenly cooked every time.The large capacity means you can prepare large batches of food, while the 4.4 QTs per basket allow you to cook multiple dishes simultaneously. Say goodbye to long wait times and hello crispy food cooked fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Looks used!!! Scratches and fingerprints and hair🤮
reviews.reviewText: I literally just opened this andWas excited to leave on my countertop. Last one left from buyer so jumped on it. I was kinda wondering why it went from $150 unit to $80 no mention of being used or scratched like someone tried cleaning it with abrasive towel or scrubber! And there was hair in one of the baskets Disappointed to say the least..
